destinations.name: Paris, France
destinations.shortDescription: The city of lights and love.
destinations.description: Explore the romantic city of Paris with its iconic Eiffel Tower, world-class museums, and charming streets.

destinations.name: Tokyo, Japan
destinations.shortDescription: A bustling metropolis with ancient roots.
destinations.description: Discover the perfect blend of tradition and modernity in Tokyo, with its stunning temples and cutting-edge technology.
